subject: 940p 4/20 Update: C-O-R-R-E-C-T-I-O-N
body:
940p 4/20 Update: C-O-R-R-E-C-T-I-O-N



=================================

CBS NEWS Coverage of Breaking Space News
Last Updated: 09:40 p.m., 04/20/07 (all times Eastern)

By William Harwood
CBS News Space Consultant

Changes and additions:

   04/07/07 (02:00 p.m.): Soyuz launched
   04/09/07 (03:20 p.m.): Soyuz TMA-10 docks with space station
   04/09/07 (06:30 p.m.): Hatches opened; station crew welcomes Soyuz cosmonauts, Simonyi aboard
   04/20/07 (03:30 p.m.): Station crew prepares for Saturday landing
   04/20/07 (09:40 p.m.): CORRECTION

=================================

C-O-R-R-E-C-T-I-O-N

In today's status report previewing the planned Saturday landing of outgoing space station commander Mike Lopez-Alegria, Mikhail Tyurin and space tourist Charles Simonyi, I mistakenly referred to their craft as Soyuz TMA-10. They are returning, as stated elsewhere in the same story, aboard the Soyuz TMA-9 spacecraft. My apologies for the confusion.

=================================
